spec.name: Zaouiya Derkaouia
spec.description: Zaouiya Derkaouia (Zawiya Derqawiyya) is a religious center associated with the Darqawa Sufi order. Located near the historical core of Casablanca, it serves as a spiritual and social hub for members of the Sufi brotherhood, providing a place for religious rituals, learning, and community engagement.

people.comment: Historical figure of the Derkaouia order (Requires local verification).

access.comment: Access is generally restricted to members of the Sufi order or with prior permission.
